title: Cleartrip to strengthen hotels business, focus on 'winning' domestic market over next one year, says senior executive
description: In a bid to strengthen its hotels business, Flipkart owned Cleartrip launched Premium Getaways last week. Currently, the premium travel experiences service has been introduced in partnership with over 40 hotels across over 25 destinations. Over the next six months, the coverage will be across over 500 hotels covering all major tourist destinations.
